
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VGeneralControlPacket.cpp
          VGeneralControlPacket.h
          VGeneralControlPacket__Syms.cpp
          VGeneralControlPacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS GeneralControlPacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/GeneralControlPacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VGeneralControlPacket STATIC VGeneralControlPacket.cpp VGeneralControlPacket__Syms.cpp
    GeneralControlPacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VGeneralControlPacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VGeneralControlPacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VGeneralControlPacket verilated)
